alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 14 at 1:14PM MST until November 16 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Laramie Valley, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From early Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including those towing campers and light loaded tractor trailers. Blow off and blow over risks will be elevated to extreme.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
